description: Schema to define a target for a particular season

module.description: The module associated with the target

group.description: The pose group this target is associated with

location.description: The pose location label this target is associated with

index.description: The pose index within the location group this target is associated with

position.description: The pose position label this target is associated with

action.description: The pose action this target is associated with

measurement.description: The target measurement value for this target
